name: open_pull_requests
description: Provides information about the number of open pull requests in the repository.

dimensions.name: state
dimensions.description: The state of the pull request, e.g., open or closed.

measures.name: open_pr_count
measures.description: The total number of open pull requests.

sample_questions: How many open PRs are on the repo?
sql_to_underlying_datasource: SELECT COUNT(pull_requests.pull_requests.number) AS open_pr_count FROM pull_requests.pull_requests WHERE state = 'open'
